name: Diceblox
description:
Match the number of pips of the down face of your die with the objective tile. Can you beat all levels?

There is a known issue with the WebGL build where you may not be able to complete the level at first. If that happens, try moving the die back and forth at the end and it should work eventually. Sorry for that!

Controls:
WASD / Arrow Keys - Movement

Diceblox was created by Daniel HCC for GMTK Game Jam 2022

Asset packs:
- DOTween - Demigiant
- Simple Dice by DoggoOfSpeed @ OpenGameArt.org
